name: Quantum's Rick
description:
Good Job, good result (for our first Ludum Dare) 

Impression: 
We were inspired by amazing sitcom "Rick and Morty"! 
The game is about collapsed time, that Rick's is trying to fix it. 
Gameplay: 
A simple game, with one click on the screen, the player can restore the normal flow of time or multiply the number of universes in two. 
Everything decides a fraction of a second.
